items.definition: The state of being happy, healthy, and comfortable.

examples.text: She prioritizes her well-being by exercising regularly.
examples.translation: Dia memprioritaskan kesejahteraannya dengan berolahraga secara teratur.

examples.text: If she doesn't take care of her well-being, she will get sick easily.
examples.translation: Jika dia tidak menjaga kesejahteraannya, dia akan sakit dengan mudah.

examples.text: She exercises regularly and eats healthy food to maintain her well-being.
examples.translation: Dia berolahraga secara teratur dan makan makanan sehat untuk menjaga kesejahteraannya.

examples.text: While she was working, she realized that her well-being was more important than her job, so she decided to quit and start her own business, which allowed her to have more time for herself and her family.
examples.translation: Saat dia bekerja, dia menyadari bahwa kesejahteraannya lebih penting daripada pekerjaannya, sehingga dia memutuskan untuk berhenti dan memulai bisnis sendiri, yang memungkinkan dia untuk memiliki lebih banyak waktu untuk dirinya sendiri dan keluarganya.

items.definition: the state of being protected against a disease or infection, or the state of being safe from harm or injury

examples.text: Vaccination provides immunity to many diseases.
examples.translation: Vaksinasi memberikan kekebalan terhadap banyak penyakit.

examples.text: Because she had been infected with the disease before, she developed immunity to it.
examples.translation: Karena dia telah terinfeksi penyakit itu sebelumnya, dia mengembangkan kekebalan terhadapnya.

examples.text: The country has immunity to the disease, but the neighboring country does not.
examples.translation: Negara tersebut memiliki kekebalan terhadap penyakit itu, tetapi negara tetangga tidak.

examples.text: While the new vaccine provides immunity to the disease, it also has some side effects, because it contains certain chemicals that can cause allergic reactions.
examples.translation: Sementara vaksin baru memberikan kekebalan terhadap penyakit itu, juga memiliki beberapa efek samping, karena mengandung bahan kimia tertentu yang dapat menyebabkan reaksi alergi.

items.definition: The study of food and how it affects the body, or the process of eating and using food to keep the body healthy

examples.text: Proper nutrition is essential for good health.
examples.translation: Gizi yang baik sangat penting untuk kesehatan yang baik.

examples.text: Because she had a poor diet, the doctor advised her that proper nutrition was necessary if she wanted to recover quickly.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki pola makan yang buruk, dokter menyarankannya bahwa gizi yang baik diperlukan jika dia ingin pulih dengan cepat.

examples.text: I exercise regularly and I also eat a healthy diet to ensure I get good nutrition and stay fit.
examples.translation: Saya berolahraga secara teratur dan saya juga makan makanan sehat untuk memastikan saya mendapatkan gizi yang baik dan tetap bugar.

examples.text: While it is true that regular exercise can improve our physical health, it is also important to remember that good nutrition is necessary if we want to achieve the best results, and that is why I always try to eat a balanced diet.
examples.translation: Sementara itu benar bahwa olahraga teratur dapat meningkatkan kesehatan fisik kita, juga penting untuk diingat bahwa gizi yang baik diperlukan jika kita ingin mencapai hasil terbaik, dan itulah mengapa saya selalu mencoba makan makanan seimbang.

items.definition: The condition of being grossly fat or overweight, to the point of being unhealthy.

examples.text: Obesity is a major health problem.
examples.translation: Kegemukan adalah masalah kesehatan yang besar.

examples.text: Because obesity is a major health problem, many people try to lose weight.
examples.translation: Karena kegemukan adalah masalah kesehatan yang besar, banyak orang berusaha untuk menurunkan berat badan.

examples.text: Obesity is a major health problem, and it affects many people worldwide.
examples.translation: Kegemukan adalah masalah kesehatan yang besar, dan itu mempengaruhi banyak orang di seluruh dunia.

examples.text: While obesity is a major health problem that affects many people worldwide, it can be prevented by eating a healthy diet and exercising regularly, because a healthy lifestyle is essential for overall well-being.
examples.translation: Sementara kegemukan adalah masalah kesehatan yang besar yang mempengaruhi banyak orang di seluruh dunia, itu dapat dicegah dengan makan makanan yang sehat dan berolahraga secara teratur, karena gaya hidup sehat sangat penting untuk kesejahteraan secara keseluruhan.

items.definition: a way of life in which people spend a lot of time sitting or not being physically active

examples.text: She leads a sedentary lifestyle.
examples.translation: Dia menjalani gaya hidup kurang gerak.

examples.text: Because she works from home, she has a sedentary lifestyle.
examples.translation: Karena dia bekerja dari rumah, dia menjalani gaya hidup kurang gerak.

examples.text: She leads a sedentary lifestyle and never exercises, but her brother is very active.
examples.translation: Dia menjalani gaya hidup kurang gerak dan tidak pernah berolahraga, tetapi saudaranya sangat aktif.

examples.text: While she leads a sedentary lifestyle, her brother is very active because he works outdoors and enjoys playing sports.
examples.translation: Sementara dia menjalani gaya hidup kurang gerak, saudaranya sangat aktif karena dia bekerja di luar ruangan dan menikmati bermain olahraga.

items.definition: any disease of the heart or the blood vessels, for example coronary heart disease, angina, or stroke

examples.text: Cardiovascular disease is a major cause of death worldwide.
examples.translation: Penyakit kardiovaskular adalah penyebab utama kematian di seluruh dunia.

examples.text: Because she had a family history of cardiovascular disease, she made sure to exercise regularly.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki riwayat keluarga dengan penyakit kardiovaskular, dia memastikan untuk berolahraga secara teratur.

examples.text: Cardiovascular disease is a major health problem, and it is increasing rapidly, especially in developing countries.
examples.translation: Penyakit kardiovaskular adalah masalah kesehatan besar, dan itu meningkat dengan cepat, terutama di negara-negara berkembang.

examples.text: While cardiovascular disease is a major cause of death worldwide, it can be prevented by maintaining a healthy lifestyle, and because of this, many people are now more aware of the importance of regular exercise and a balanced diet.
examples.translation: Sementara penyakit kardiovaskular adalah penyebab utama kematian di seluruh dunia, itu dapat dicegah dengan menjaga gaya hidup sehat, dan karena itu, banyak orang sekarang lebih menyadari pentingnya olahraga teratur dan pola makan seimbang.

items.definition: a medical condition in which the body does not produce enough insulin, leading to high blood sugar levels

examples.text: Diabetes is a common disease.
examples.translation: Penyakit gula atau kencing manis adalah penyakit yang umum.

examples.text: Because she has diabetes, she needs to watch her diet.
examples.translation: Karena dia menderita penyakit gula, dia perlu menjaga pola makannya.

examples.text: Diabetes is a serious disease, and it requires constant medical attention.
examples.translation: Penyakit gula adalah penyakit yang serius, dan memerlukan perawatan medis yang konstan.

examples.text: While diabetes is a serious disease, it can be managed with proper diet and exercise, because a healthy lifestyle is crucial for people with this condition.
examples.translation: Sementara penyakit gula adalah penyakit yang serius, penyakit ini dapat dikendalikan dengan pola makan dan olahraga yang tepat, karena gaya hidup sehat sangat penting bagi orang-orang dengan kondisi ini.

items.definition: a medical condition in which the blood pressure is too high

examples.text: The doctor diagnosed her with hypertension.
examples.translation: Dokter mendiagnosa bahwa dia menderita hipertensi.

examples.text: Because she had hypertension, the doctor advised her to reduce her salt intake.
examples.translation: Karena dia menderita hipertensi, dokter menyarankannya untuk mengurangi konsumsi garam.

examples.text: The patient had hypertension and diabetes, so she needed to take medication every day.
examples.translation: Pasien menderita hipertensi dan diabetes, jadi dia perlu mengonsumsi obat setiap hari.

examples.text: While the new medication helped to lower her blood pressure, the patient still had to deal with the effects of hypertension, which had already damaged her kidneys.
examples.translation: Sementara obat baru membantu menurunkan tekanan darahnya, pasien masih harus menghadapi dampak hipertensi, yang sudah merusak ginjalnya.

items.definition: a condition that makes someone sick or uncomfortable when they eat, touch, or breathe something

examples.text: She has an allergy to peanuts.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki alergi kacang tanah.

examples.text: Because she has an allergy to dust, she always wears a mask when cleaning.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki alergi debu, dia selalu mengenakan masker saat membersihkan.

examples.text: She has an allergy to cats, and she also hates dogs.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki alergi kucing, dan dia juga membenci anjing.

examples.text: Although she has an allergy to shellfish, she loves eating fish, but she always checks the ingredients carefully.
examples.translation: Meskipun dia memiliki alergi kerang, dia suka makan ikan, tetapi dia selalu memeriksa bahan-bahan dengan hati-hati.

items.definition: A person's condition with regard to their psychological and emotional well-being.

examples.text: She takes care of her mental health by exercising regularly.
examples.translation: Dia menjaga kesehatan mentalnya dengan berolahraga secara teratur.

examples.text: Because she suffered from anxiety, she decided to seek help from a therapist to improve her mental health.
examples.translation: Karena dia menderita kecemasan, dia memutuskan untuk mencari bantuan dari seorang terapis untuk memperbaiki kesehatan mentalnya.

examples.text: Mental health is important, and she takes care of it, but her sister neglects her own.
examples.translation: Kesehatan mental penting, dan dia menjaganya, tapi adiknya mengabaikan kesehatan mentalnya sendiri.

examples.text: While mental health is crucial for overall well-being, she has been struggling to maintain hers because she has a lot of work, and her sister, who has the same problem, has been trying to find a balance between work and personal life.
examples.translation: Sementara kesehatan mental sangat penting untuk kesejahteraan secara keseluruhan, dia telah berjuang untuk mempertahankannya karena dia memiliki banyak pekerjaan, dan adiknya, yang memiliki masalah yang sama, telah mencoba untuk menemukan keseimbangan antara pekerjaan dan kehidupan pribadi.

items.definition: a feeling of sadness and hopelessness, often causing a person to lose interest in things they normally enjoy

examples.text: She has been suffering from depression for years.
examples.translation: Dia telah menderita depresi selama bertahun-tahun.

examples.text: Because she lost her job, she felt depressed and didn't know what to do.
examples.translation: Karena dia kehilangan pekerjaannya, dia merasa depresi dan tidak tahu apa yang harus dilakukan.

examples.text: She felt depressed and anxious, but she still went to the party.
examples.translation: Dia merasa depresi dan cemas, tapi dia masih pergi ke pesta.

examples.text: Although she had been suffering from depression for a long time, she still managed to finish her degree because she was determined to succeed, and her family supported her.
examples.translation: Meskipun dia telah menderita depresi selama waktu lama, dia masih berhasil menyelesaikan gelarnya karena dia bertekad untuk sukses, dan keluarganya mendukungnya.

items.definition: a mental health condition where a person feels worried, nervous, or frightened all the time

examples.text: She has an anxiety disorder.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki gangguan kecemasan.

examples.text: Because she has an anxiety disorder, she often feels nervous in public.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki gangguan kecemasan, dia sering merasa gugup di depan umum.

examples.text: She has an anxiety disorder, and she also struggles with depression.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki gangguan kecemasan, dan dia juga berjuang melawan depresi.

examples.text: While she has an anxiety disorder, and she also struggles with depression, her therapist helps her to manage both conditions.
examples.translation: Sementara dia memiliki gangguan kecemasan, dan dia juga berjuang melawan depresi, terapisnya membantunya untuk mengelola kedua kondisi tersebut.

items.definition: Treatment for a mental or physical illness
A process of immunization against diseases

Capable of being transmitted from person to person
The process of recovering from an illness or injury
Poor nutrition due to an unbalanced diet
A treatment approach that considers the whole person
Natural treatments derived from plants
A compulsive dependency on substances or activities
Physical or psychological effects after stopping a substance
A disease caused by genetic abnormalities
The body’s defense mechanism against infections
Diseases affecting the lungs and airways
A long-term health condition
A sudden and severe medical condition
The well-being of workers in their workplace
Practices that maintain cleanliness and health
The transitional stage from childhood to adulthood
The period when a person undergoes physical changes
The growth of thinking and understanding abilities
The ability to manage emotions effectively
The ability to interact effectively with others
Influence from one’s social group
The ability to take care of oneself without relying on others
The practice of self-control and obedience to rules
The duty of being accountable for one’s actions
Confidence in one’s abilities and worth
Physical activity that increases heart rate and oxygen intake
Short bursts of high-intensity activity that do not rely on oxygen
The ability to sustain physical activity over time
The ability of muscles and joints to move through their full range of
Exercise designed to increase muscle power and endurance
The efficiency of the heart, lungs, and blood vessels during exercise
The increase in muscle size due to resistance training
The body’s process of converting food into energy
A workout involving short bursts of intense activity followed by rest
The proportion of fat, muscle, and bone in the body
Elastic bands used for strength training exercises
The number of times an exercise is performed in a set
A group of repetitions performed without rest
A preparatory activity before intense exercise
A set of low-intensity exercises performed after a workout
Exercises that involve explosive movements to improve power
The ability to move quickly and easily
The strength of the muscles around the abdomen and lower back
The way in which a person holds their body
The period needed for muscles to heal after exercise
A substance that builds up in muscles during intense exercise
Maintaining sufficient water levels in the body
Excessive exercise that leads to fatigue and decreased performance
Alternating between high and low-intensity exercise
The ability to focus on muscle engagement during exercise
